commitResults.messageBody:
- add listen instance method to accept user input from commandline
- refactor main to call greet and goodbye in listen method

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for add and list tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
- Refactor "listen" instance method to use switch-case to determine command
- Add instance field ArrayList "tasks" to store tasks
- Add instance method "listTasks" to list all tasks
- Add instance method "addTask" to add tasks to private instance field "tasks"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for mark as done
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create new class Task to abstract the behaviour and properties of task
- Add ability to split user input into command and arguments to support mark as done feature
- Add extra case statements to switch block in "listen" to handle "mark" and "unmark" commands
- Rename kuki to shinobu for clarity
- Convert instance field "tasks" from ArrayList<String> to ArrayList<Task> to support new Task class
- Modify listTasks to account for change in string representation of task

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for different task types
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add Todo, Deadline and Event subclasses to support different task types
- Convert Task to an abstract class
- Shift arguments handling into the command handlers themselves
- Add addTodo, addDeadline and addEvent instance methods to handle new
  commands

- Add custom checked exception KukiShinobuException for error handling
- Modify "listen"  to handle checked exception KukiShinobuException
- Add error handling for misconfigured arguments for the various commands

- Add deleteTask and printDeletedTaskSummary methods
- Modify logic of markAsDone and unmarkAsDone to be similar to deleteTask
- Modify greeting to better reflect true personality of Kuki Shinobu

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for file reading feature
commitResults.messageBody:
- Overload constructor for `Task`, `Todo`, `Deadline` and `Event` classes with an additional method signature that accepts an additional `isDone` argument to allow direct instantiation of the aforementioned classes with its `isDone` field set to `true`.
- Add `loadDatabaseFile()`, `parseTasks` and `readFile` methods to `KukiShinobu` to handle file reading, parsing and error handling.
- Modify `listen` public method in `KukiShinobu` to update the file contents for every iteration of the while loop to ensure that it is kept up to date.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for file writing feature
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add "getDatabaseString" methods in Task and its subclasses to facilitate writing to database text file
- Add `writeToDatabaseFile` method to write updated tasks to file every time the user performs a command

- Add public static methods `getDateStringPrintFormat` and `getDateStringStorageFormat` to parent abstract class `Task` to abstract the various string representations of `LocalDate` required in our application
- Modify date representation in `Deadline` and `Event` classes

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to support MoreOOP and Packages
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create command, exception, parser, storage, task and ui packages so that Command and its subclasses can work
- Add Command abstract class and subclasses for each command to abstract away the logic
- Add Parse, Storage, TaskList and Ui classes to abstract the logic for parsing command, file read/write, managing tasks and user input/output respectively
- Revamp KukiShinobu main class to use the new classes and removed all unnecessary code

commitResults.messageTitle: Add tests for Parser and TaskList classes
Modify build.gradle to facilitate building of jar file
Modify code more closely adhere to the style guide after comments from peers
commitResults.messageBody:
- remove unnecessary commented out code and annotations
- replace all wildcard imports with explicit imports
- rename `fw` to `filewriter` for clarity

commitResults.messageTitle: Add header comments to Command and all its subclasses
Add header comments to all files in the exception package
Add header comments to KukiShinobu, Parser and Storage classes
Add header comments to all files in task and ui packages
Fix styling issues in several parts of the code

commitResults.messageBody:
- Add `findMatchingTasks` method to `TaskList` class
- Add `FindCommand` command to handle the command
- Modify `Parser` to handle find command from user input
